name: Mastermind (Verlag Game On)
overview: A logic based Board game created by Martijn Tonies and published in Game On 1995/02. In this game the computer secretly puts four dots behind the shield. It will use any combination of 4-9 colors depending on the difficulty you choose. It can use dots of the same color. Its up to you to try to duplicate the exact secret code. Each time you guess a row of colors the computer will tell you which dot is wrong, right or right but in the wrong place. You can then try again. The winner is the one which guesses the code as fast as possible in the least amount of tries.
